desc: Bin Crazy is Springfield's premium source for overstock, shelf pulls, returns, and liquidation items, including high end electronics! All from the worlds largest offline and online retailers! We have the best deals in the Springfield area!! All items in the bins will be priced according the day of the week.

layout.text: No Cash, No Bags, No Returns...Just CRAZY deals!!!
The array of items is large! Come and experience the Bin Crazy life!
